carpet.rule.carpetBotsSkipNight.desc: Allows the night to be skipped without carpet bots/fake players being asleep.
carpet.rule.carpetBotPrefix.desc: If carpet bots/fake players should get a prefix attached. Note: You can edit the prefix appearance by editing the team "bots" with the "/team command"
carpet.rule.betterEnderPearlChunkLoading: Allows ender pearls to pass through unloaded chunks. Note: This is not officially compatible with carpet extra's enderPearlChunkLoading being active.
